1. Install Ubuntu 24.04 LTS
2. Update and upgrade system
3. Setup VS Code
4. Setup Curl
5. [Setup julia via juliaup](https://github.com/JuliaLang/juliaup)
6. [Setup pyenv](https://github.com/pyenv/pyenv?tab=readme-ov-file)
7. Install some supporting packages
```
sudo apt install -y \
    build-essential cmake \
    gmsh paraview \
    libopenblas-dev libscalapack-mpi-dev libmumps-dev \
    libhdf5-mpi-dev libfftw3-mpi-dev libptscotch-dev \
    mpi-default-bin mpi-default-dev
snap install freecad
  ```
